name: Onfolk
headline: Gusto for the UK
description:
We make it easy for growing teams to set up and run their payroll & HR (instead of a mess of spreadsheets, poorly integrated tools, and emails with accountants).

- 1 min to run payroll
- 2 mins to onboard new starters
- Hands-off pension & accounting integrations
- Centralised employee info, time-off, and reporting

Our team are software engineers who spent 4 years scaling Monzo from 400k to 6m customers. While at Monzo we repeatedly got paid incorrectly by their poor payroll providers. So we decided to build the product that they should have used from day 1.

We’ve gained certification as a payroll software from the UK government.

founders.name: Naz Malik, Founder
founders.description: Psychology grad, ex-investigative journalist, ex-Monzo engineer

founders.name: Charlie Thomas, Founder

**Onfolk: Simplifying Payroll and HR for Growing Teams in the UK**

Founded in 2020 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S21, Onfolk aims to revolutionize payroll and HR processes in the UK, akin to what Gusto has achieved in the U.S. With a dedicated team of ex-Monzo engineers who tackled payroll issues firsthand, Onfolk is designed to eliminate the tedious methods involving spreadsheets and disjointed tools.

**Core Offerings:**
- **Streamlined Payroll:** Process payroll in just **1 minute**, saving up to 90% of the time required by traditional methods.
- **Quick Onboarding:** Onboard new team members in about **2 minutes** through a user-friendly interface.
- **Integrated Systems:** The platform features hands-off integrations with pensions and accounting, ensuring smooth operations.
- **Centralized Information:** Manage employee data, time-off requests, and HR reporting all in one hub.

Located in London, Onfolk operates with a lean team of four and has secured certification as a payroll software provider from the UK government. The platform's straightforward accessibility makes it ideal for businesses aiming to grow without the burden of complicated administrative tasks. 

Customers are raving about Onfolk's efficiency, with testimonials highlighting time saved and improved focus on company culture. The service not only takes care of payroll but also provides expert support to help companies navigate their HR challenges. 

To summarize, Onfolk is about delivering a seamless payroll experience that allows businesses to scale up their operations without getting bogged down in administrative chaos. For more details, visit their [website](http://onfolk.com). 

It’s a bold solution for any company ready to streamline its payroll and HR processes—simple, smart, and effective.
